sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.RC_NO, NVL(A.CASE_NO,A.ITIV_NO) AS CASE_IV_NO, A.CASE_NO, A.PRSCT_DE, /*입건일자*/ A.INV_PROVIS_CD, /*수사단서*/ DECODE(A.RC_SE_CD, 'T' ,'임시','I','내사','F','정식') AS RC_SE_NM, /*사건구분*/ FN_CD_NM (A.INV_PROVIS_CD) AS INV_PROVIS_NM, FN_RC_VIOLT_UPPER_NMS (A.RC_NO) AS VIOLT_NM, /*위반사항*/ FN_RC_TRGTER_NM (A.RC_NO, '00697') AS TRGTER_NM_S, /*피의자*/ FN_RC_TRGTER_NM (A.RC_NO, '00698') AS TRGTER_NM_V, /*피해자*/ FN_USER_NM(#esntl_id#) AS WRITNG_NM, FN_DEPT_NM(#dept_cd#) AS WRITNG_DEPT_NM, FN_EXMN_NM(CMPTNC_EXMN_CD) AS CMPTNC_EXMN_NM FROM RC_TMPR A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.CHARGER_DEPT_CD = #dept_cd# AND A.CHARGER_ID = #esntl_id# AND DECODE(A.RC_SE_CD, 'T' ,A.TMPR_NO,'I',A.ITIV_NO,'F',A.CASE_NO) IS NOT NULL /*사건번호,내사번호,임시번호*/ AND A.RC_SE_CD = 'F' /*정식사건만, 2020.01.29. 내사 사건 추가*/ AND A.PROGRS_STTUS_CD IN ('02103','02121','02122','02131','02132','02141','02143') AND A.CASE_NO IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT A.RC_NO, NVL(A.CASE_NO,A.ITIV_NO) AS CASE_IV_NO, A.CASE_NO, A.PRSCT_DE, /*입건일자*/ A.INV_PROVIS_CD, /*수사단서*/ DECODE(A.RC_SE_CD, 'T' ,'임시','I','내사','F','정식') AS RC_SE_NM, /*사건구분*/ FN_CD_NM (A.INV_PROVIS_CD) AS INV_PROVIS_NM, FN_RC_VIOLT_UPPER_NMS (A.RC_NO) AS VIOLT_NM, /*위반사항*/ FN_RC_TRGTER_NM (A.RC_NO, '00697') AS TRGTER_NM_S, /*피의자*/ FN_RC_TRGTER_NM (A.RC_NO, '00698') AS TRGTER_NM_V, /*피해자*/ FN_USER_NM(#esntl_id#) AS WRITNG_NM, FN_DEPT_NM(#dept_cd#) AS WRITNG_DEPT_NM, FN_EXMN_NM(CMPTNC_EXMN_CD) AS CMPTNC_EXMN_NM FROM RC_TMPR A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.CHARGER_DEPT_CD = #dept_cd# AND A.CHARGER_ID = #esntl_id# AND DECODE(A.RC_SE_CD, 'T' ,A.TMPR_NO,'I',A.ITIV_NO,'F',A.CASE_NO) IS NOT NULL /*사건번호,내사번호,임시번호*/ AND A.RC_SE_CD = 'I' /*정식사건만, 2020.01.29. 내사 사건 추가*/ AND A.PROGRS_STTUS_CD IN ('02103','02121','02122','02131','02132','02141','02143')
ORDER BY CASE_IV_NO

SELECT IPT.RC_NO, RT.CASE_NO, NVL(RT.CASE_NO,RT.ITIV_NO) AS CASE_IV_NO, IPT.TRGTER_SN, IPT.TRGTER_NM, DGUARD.DECRYPT('TBL','ENC',IPT.TRGTER_RRN) AS TRGTER_RRN, FN_RC_VIOLT_NM (IPT.RC_NO) AS VIOLT_NM, IPT.ARREST_YN, IPT.ARREST_DT, FN_CD_NM(IPT.ARREST_PLACE_CD) AS ARREST_PLACE_NM, FN_CD_NM(IPT.ARRST_TY_CD) AS ARRST_TY_NM, IPT.SORT_ORDR FROM RC_TMPR_TRGTER IPT JOIN RC_TMPR RT ON IPT.RC_NO = RT.RC_NO WHERE IPT.RC_NO = #rc_no# AND IPT.USE_YN = 'Y' AND IPT.TRGTER_SE_CD IN ( SELECT CC.ESNTL_CD FROM CMN_CD CC WHERE CC.UPPER_CD = '00102' AND CC.CD_DC = 'suspct-Group' /*피의자 그룹 전체*/ ) /*AND IPT.TRGTER_SE_CD = '00697'*/ ORDER BY SORT_ORDR,TRGTER_SN ASC

SELECT IPT.TRGTER_SN ||':'|| PA.ARRST_SN AS PK_SN, IPT.RC_NO, IPT.TRGTER_SN, IPT.TRGTER_NM, DGUARD.DECRYPT('TBL','ENC',IPT.TRGTER_RRN) AS TRGTER_RRN, PA.ARRST_SN, FN_CD_NM(PA.ARRST_TY_CD) AS ARRST_TY_NM, TO_CHAR(PA.ARRST_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ARRST_DT, TO_CHAR(PA.RSL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS RSL_DT FROM RC_TMPR_TRGTER IPT INNER JOIN INV_PRSCT_ARRST PA ON IPT.RC_NO = PA.RC_NO AND IPT.TRGTER_SN = PA.TRGTER_SN AND PA.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE IPT.RC_NO = #rc_no# AND IPT.USE_YN = 'Y' AND IPT.TRGTER_SE_CD = '00697' ORDER BY IPT.TRGTER_SN ASC, PA.ARRST_DT DESC

SELECT S.SUGEST_NO, S.RC_NO, S.TRGTER_SN, S.SUGEST_TY_CD, FN_CD_NM(S.SUGEST_TY_CD) AS SUGEST_TY_NM, S.SUGEST_CL_CD, FN_CD_NM(S.SUGEST_CL_CD) AS SUGEST_CL_NM, S.INV_SUGEST_YN, S.SUGEST_RESULT_CD, ( CASE WHEN S.SUGEST_RESULT_CD = 'Y' THEN '가' WHEN S.SUGEST_RESULT_CD = 'N' THEN '부' WHEN S.SUGEST_RESULT_CD = 'C' THEN '비고' ELSE '' END ) AS SUGEST_RESULT_NM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(S.SUGEST_DE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SUGEST_DE, S.SUGEST_CN, S.RSL_RESN, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(S.CMND_DE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CMND_DE, S.CMND_CN, S.CMND_PRSEC_NM, S.DOC_ID, S.FILE_ID, S.WRITNG_ID, S.WRITNG_DT, S.UPDT_ID, S.UPDT_DT, (SELECT FN_EXMN_NM(IP.CMPTNC_EXMN_CD) FROM RC_TMPR IP WHERE IP.RC_NO = S.RC_NO) AS CMPTNC_EXMN_NM, FN_RC_TRGTER_NM (S.RC_NO, '00697') AS TRGTER_NM_S, /*피의자*/ FN_RC_TRGTER_NM (S.RC_NO, '00698') AS TRGTER_NM_V, /*피해자*/ S.SUGEST_OPINION_CD FROM INV_SUGEST S WHERE S.RC_NO = #rc_no# AND S.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY S.SUGEST_NO ASC

SELECT S.TRGTER_SN ||':'|| S.ARRST_SN AS PK_SN, S.SUGEST_NO, S.RC_NO, S.TRGTER_SN, S.ARRST_SN, S.SUGEST_TY_CD, FN_CD_NM(S.SUGEST_TY_CD) AS SUGEST_TY_NM, S.SUGEST_CL_CD, FN_CD_NM(S.SUGEST_CL_CD) AS SUGEST_CL_NM, S.INV_SUGEST_YN, S.SUGEST_RESULT_CD, ( CASE WHEN S.SUGEST_RESULT_CD = 'Y' THEN '가' WHEN S.SUGEST_RESULT_CD = 'N' THEN '부' WHEN S.SUGEST_RESULT_CD = 'C' THEN '비고' ELSE '' END ) AS SUGEST_RESULT_NM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(S.SUGEST_DE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SUGEST_DE, S.SUGEST_CN, S.RSL_RESN, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(S.CMND_DE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CMND_DE, S.CMND_CN, S.CMND_PRSEC_NM, S.DOC_ID, S.FILE_ID, FN_DEPT_NM(S.WRITNG_DEPT_CD) AS WRITNG_DEPT_NM, S.WRITNG_DEPT_CD, FN_USER_NM(S.WRITNG_ID) AS WRITNG_NM, S.WRITNG_ID, S.WRITNG_DT, S.UPDT_ID, S.UPDT_DT, S.SUGEST_OPINION_CD, (SELECT FN_EXMN_NM(IP.CMPTNC_EXMN_CD) FROM RC_TMPR IP WHERE IP.RC_NO = S.RC_NO) AS CMPTNC_EXMN_NM FROM INV_SUGEST S WHERE S.SUGEST_NO = #sugest_no# AND S.USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT IC.RC_NO, IC.CCDRC_NO, IC.CCDRC_SN, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(IC.SZURE_DE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') SZURE_DE, IC.CCDRC_CL_CD, FN_CD_NM(IC.CCDRC_CL_CD) AS CCDRC_CL_CD_NM, IC.CCDRC_NM, IC.CCDRC_QY, IC.CCDRC_DC, IC.DSPS_CD, FN_CD_NM(IC.DSPS_CD) AS DSPS_CD_NM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(IC.DSPS_DE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DSPS_DE, IC.DSPS_RM, IC.POLC_OPINION, FN_CCDRC_TRGTER_NM(IC.CCDRC_NO, IC.CCDRC_SN, IC.RC_NO, 'S') AS CF_SZURE_TRGTER_NM, FN_CCDRC_TRGTER_NM(IC.CCDRC_NO, IC.CCDRC_SN, IC.RC_NO, 'P') AS CF_POSESN_TRGTER_NM, (CASE WHEN SC.SUGEST_NO IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS SUGEST_YN FROM INV_CCDRC IC LEFT JOIN INV_SUGEST_CCDRC SC ON IC.CCDRC_NO = SC.CCDRC_NO AND IC.CCDRC_SN = SC.CCDRC_SN AND SC.SUGEST_NO = #sugest_no# WHERE IC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND IC.RC_NO = #rc_no# ORDER BY IC.CCDRC_NO ASC, IC.CCDRC_SN ASC
SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') ||'-'|| LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(SUGEST_NO,6))),0)+1,6,'0') FROM INV_SUGEST WHERE SUGEST_NO LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') || '%'
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO INV_SUGEST( SUGEST_NO, RC_NO, TRGTER_SN, ARRST_SN, SUGEST_TY_CD, SUGEST_CL_CD, INV_SUGEST_YN, SUGEST_RESULT_CD, SUGEST_DE, SUGEST_CN, RSL_RESN, CMND_DE, CMND_CN, CMND_PRSEC_NM, DOC_ID, FILE_ID, USE_YN, WRITNG_DEPT_CD, WRITNG_ID, WRITNG_DT, SUGEST_OPINION_CD ) VALUES( #sugest_no#, #rc_no#, #trgter_sn#, #arrst_sn#, #sugest_ty_cd#, #sugest_cl_cd#, 'Y', #sugest_result_cd#, REPLACE(#sugest_de#,'-',''), #sugest_cn#, #rsl_resn#, REPLACE(#cmnd_de#,'-',''), #cmnd_cn#, #cmnd_prsec_nm#, #doc_id#, #file_id#, 'Y', #dept_cd#, #esntl_id#, SYSDATE, #sugest_opinion_cd# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE INV_SUGEST SET
TRGTER_SN = #trgter_sn#,
ARRST_SN = #arrst_sn#,
SUGEST_CL_CD = #sugest_cl_cd#,
SUGEST_RESULT_CD = #sugest_result_cd#, SUGEST_DE = REPLACE(#sugest_de#,'-',''), SUGEST_CN = #sugest_cn#, CMND_DE = REPLACE(#cmnd_de#,'-',''), CMND_CN = #cmnd_cn#, CMND_PRSEC_NM = #cmnd_prsec_nm#, UPDT_ID = #esntl_id#, UPDT_DT = SYSDATE, SUGEST_OPINION_CD = #sugest_opinion_cd# WHERE SUGEST_NO = #sugest_no#
UPDATE INV_SUGEST SET USE_YN = 'N', UPDT_ID = #esntl_id#, UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE SUGEST_NO = #sugest_no#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO INV_SUGEST_CCDRC( SUGEST_NO, CCDRC_NO, CCDRC_SN, WRITNG_ID, WRITNG_DT ) VALUES( #sugest_no#, #ccdrc_no#, #ccdrc_sn#, #esntl_id#, SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE RC_TMPR SET
PROGRS_STTUS_CD = #progrs_sttus_cd#,
UPDT_ID = #esntl_id#, UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE RC_NO = #rc_no# AND USE_YN = 'Y'
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(A.FORMAT_ID) AS CNT FROM CMN_DOC_PBLICTE A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DOC_ID IN (SELECT DOC_ID FROM INV_SUGEST WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND SUGEST_NO = #SUGEST_NO#) AND A.FORMAT_ID = '00000000000000000218' AND A.FILE_PATH IS NOT NULL
sqlMap.update: UPDATE RC_TMPR_TRGTER SET SORT_ORDR = #sort_ordr#, UPDT_ID = #esntl_id#, UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE RC_NO = #rc_no# AND TRGTER_SN = #trgter_sn#

UPDATE INV_SUGEST SET
CMND_PRSEC_NM = #CMND_PRSEC_NM#
, UPDT_ID = #esntl_id# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE
WHERE SUGEST_NO = #SUGEST_NO#
